title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8201.6 - Hours for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8201.6 - Hours for public inspection

State Regulations
(a) Requests for public access to records
shall be accepted and records produced during all hours regularly open for
business. (b) These hours are 9
a.m. to 5:30 p. m., Monday-Friday. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8201.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
